Projects.name: Cowboys n' Stuff
Projects.description: Cowboys n' Stuff is a 2D, Top-down, wave-survival orientated game where you control and customise your cowboy in order to eliminate threats as they arrive; whether it is day or night...

Projects.name: Gruttel Scuttle
Projects.description: Gruttel Scuttle is a fast-paced strategy management game, proudly produced by Trojan Mouse, a dedicated team of second-year game development students.

Projects.name: 3D PCG Animation
Projects.description: Procedural animation is a great way to dynamically position character joints without spending lots of time creating animation trees. In this case, I use PCG animation to make dynamic walk cycles.
